about.title: The We Hub Group
about.subtitle: From digital to the world: the We Hub Group was born online.

paragraph.1: Since our very first project, the We Hub Group has been digital. We specialize in identifying profitable and effective business models that maximize the monetization potential of the internet and social media.
paragraph.2: Born in the digital environment, the We Hub Group stands out by transforming trends into scalable businesses, combining innovation, data, and performance to deliver real results. With a global presence, it develops digital assets and solutions that connect brands and people, always focused on sustainable growth and impact.

hero.title: ABOUT THE GROUP
hero.subtitle: Discover our history, values, and the team that turns ideas into successful digital businesses

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: We Hub Group was born from the vision that the future of business lies in the digital environment. Since our foundation, we have been pioneers in identifying and developing innovative business models that fully leverage the internet and social media.
history.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple project but a big ambition: to democratize access to digital opportunities and create an ecosystem where businesses of all sizes could thrive online.
history.paragraph3: Today, we are recognized as one of the leading digital holdings in the market, with an international presence and a diverse portfolio of companies and projects that impact millions of people around the world.

2014.title: 2014 - Beginning of the Journey
2014.text: The company’s seed was planted in 2014, when the current CEO, driven by a passion for technology and innovation, began developing digital projects as a hobby. It was during this period that the first ideas and experiments were born, always aiming to create scalable solutions and positively impact the digital market.

2021.title: 2021 – Expansion and Official Foundation
2021.text: The exponential growth of operations gained momentum in 2021, fueled by the demand for digital solutions during the pandemic. That year, the company was officially launched as Grupo We Hub, bringing in new strategic partners to accelerate growth, expand market presence, and consolidate a more robust and collaborative structure.

2023.title: 2023 - Internationalization
2023.text: In 2023, Grupo We Hub took an important step in its journey by expanding operations into the international market, establishing a presence in the United States and Europe.

2025.title: 2025 - Recognition and Consolidation
2025.text: By 2025, Grupo We Hub had consolidated itself as one of the leading digital holdings focused on programmatic media. With a solid business portfolio, innovative solutions, and strategic presence in various markets, the company was recognized for its excellence, winning awards and gaining recognition in the technology and digital advertising sectors.

values.title: OUR VALUES
values.subtitle: The principles that guide all our decisions and actions in the digital market
values.innovationText: We constantly seek new ways to solve problems and create value through technology.
values.collaborationText: We believe in the power of collaboration and teamwork to achieve extraordinary results.
values.resultsText: We guide all our actions by clear metrics and measurable outcomes.
values.globalText: We think globally but act locally, respecting the uniqueness of each market.
values.transparencyText: We maintain clear and transparent communication with all our stakeholders.
values.excellenceText: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from service to final delivery.

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.subtitle: Talented professionals passionate about technology who make a difference every day

ceo.text: Visionary and serial entrepreneur with over 15 years of experience in digital business.

cto.text: Technology and innovation specialist responsible for leading our technical strategy.

cmo.text: Expert in digital marketing and growth hacking, driving our organic growth.

cfo.text: Responsible for financial strategy and operations, ensuring sustainable growth.

cta.title: READY TO JOIN US?
cta.subtitle: Join us on this digital transformation journey and be part of the future of online business.

1.title: 1. What are cookies?
1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, mobile) when you visit a website. They help improve your browsing experience by making the website more efficient and personalized.

2.title: 2. How do we use cookies?
2.text: On the grupowehub.com website, we use cookies to:
list: Ensure the proper functioning of the website;
Customize content and remember your preferences;
Collect anonymous statistical data to improve our services.

3.title: 3. Types of cookies we use
list: Essential cookies: required for the basic functioning of the site, such as keeping the session active and ensuring security;
Performance cookies: collect information about how the site is used so we can improve its performance;
Functionality cookies: remember your preferences to make the site easier to use.

4.title: 4. Consent and control
4.text1: By continuing to browse our website, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
4.text2: You can manage your preferences and delete cookies through your browser settings if you wish.

5.title: 5. Changes to this policy
5.text: We may update this Cookie Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the date of the latest update.

6.title: 6. Contact
6.text: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: WE HUB LLC., the operator of the grupowehub.com website, is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when using our services.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.text: We collect the personal data you provide when filling out our contact form, such as:
1.text2: In addition, we collect technical information automatically through cookies while you browse our site.

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
list: Send communications related to the services provided by our company;
Improve your experience on our website through the use of cookies.

3.title: 3. Data Storage and Retention
3.text: Your personal data is securely stored for a maximum period of 2 days after the service is completed, after which it is permanently deleted from our systems.

4.title: 4. Data Sharing
4.text: We guarantee that we DO NOT share, sell, or rent your personal data to third parties.

5.title: 5. Data Security
5.text: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

6.title: 6. Your Rights
6.text: You may request at any time:
list: Access to the information we hold about you;
Deletion of your data, respecting legal and operational retention periods.
6.text2: To exercise your rights or ask questions about privacy, contact us:

7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
7.text: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the date of the last update.

8.title: 8. Contact
8.text: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
